ca.mcgill.ecse211.model

Class Robot

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.mcgill.ecse211.model.Robot

  • public class Robot
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    jamestang This class defines the robot as a model Specify sensor methods, drive methods, define feedback mechanism ======== Set up =========== Sensors: Ultrasonic sensor: Sensor Port S4 Block light sensor (forward facing): Sensor Port S2 Floor light sensor (downward facing): Sensor Port S3 Motors: Left motor: Motor Port D Right motor: Motor Port B Ultrasonic base motor: Motor Port A

      static TextLCD getLCD()

      This method initialize the robot into original state
      static int runDiagonistic()
      Run diagonostic on the robot
      static void setSCOdometer()
      This method sets the odometer based on which starting corner the robot is assigned to important: the robot has x and y offset of one tile length from the origin after localization
      static void squareTravelTo(double xDest, double yDest)
      This method drives robot to the destination point (x,y) selecting only paths that are perpendicular to x axis or y axis, it helps to avoid cross the search zone if the search zone is obstructing the robot from starting corner to start of search zone
      static void stop()
      This method puts the robot to a synchronized stop

      This method drives robot straight for a distance

      • init

        public static int init()
                throws OdometerExceptions
        This method initialize the robot into original state
        Throws:
        OdometerExceptions

      • driveForward

        public static void driveForward()
        This method put the robot in a fixed speed drive forward

      • driveForwardWithSpeed

        public static void driveForwardWithSpeed(int fwd_speed,
                                         int acceleration_speed)
        This method put the robot in an assigned speed drive forward
        Parameters:
        fwd_speed - the forward speed
        acceleration_speed - the acceleration speed

      • driveBackward

        public static void driveBackward()
        This method put the robot in a fixed speed drive backward

      • turn

        public static void turn(java.lang.String direction)
        This method turn the robot continuously in place
        Parameters:
        int - direction: -1: turn left, 1: turn right

      • stop

        public static void stop()
        This method puts the robot to a synchronized stop

      • turnTo

        public static void turnTo(double thetaDest)
        This method turns the robot to an angle specified by thetaDest
        Parameters:
        thetaDest - : the angle needs to be turned in radian

      • travelTo

        public static void travelTo(double linearDistance)
        This method drives robot straight for a distance
        Parameters:
        linearDistance - the distance to be covered

      • travelTo

        public static void travelTo(double xDest,
                            double yDest)
        This method drives robot to a specific location using euclidean distance for shortest path
        Parameters:
        xDest: - x coordinate in cm
        yDest: - y coordinate in cm

      • squareTravelTo

        public static void squareTravelTo(double xDest,
                                  double yDest)
        This method drives robot to the destination point (x,y) selecting only paths that are perpendicular to x axis or y axis, it helps to avoid cross the search zone if the search zone is obstructing the robot from starting corner to start of search zone
        Parameters:
        xDest: - destination x
        yDest: - destination y

      • getDistance

        public static double getDistance()
        This method fetch the distance value from the ultrasonic sensor
        Returns:
        float: the distance from light sensor

      • getColor

        public static float[] getColor()
        This method fetch the color value from the forward light sensor
        Returns:
        float: the value of light from light sensor

      • getFloorColor

        public static float getFloorColor()
        This method fetch the color value from floor light sensor
        Returns:
        float: the value of light from light sensor

      • getLCD

        public static TextLCD getLCD()
        Returns:
        lcd

      • clearLCD

        public void clearLCD()
        Clears the lcd screen

      • runDiagonistic

        public static int runDiagonistic()
        Run diagonostic on the robot
        Returns:
        integer, 0: normal, 1: faulty

      • setSCOdometer

        public static void setSCOdometer()
        This method sets the odometer based on which starting corner the robot is assigned to important: the robot has x and y offset of one tile length from the origin after localization

      • alterSpeed

        public static void alterSpeed(java.lang.String type)
        Method to alter the speed of the robot DRIVE: fastest, for navigation to a destination, SEARCH: medium, for searching and scanning the area COR: slowest, for correcting robot's postion
        Parameters:
        type - string DRIVE,SEARCH,COR,FAST

      • correctLocation

        public static void correctLocation(double xExpected,
                                   double yExpected)
        Correct the robot's location
        Parameters:
        xExpected - expected x location
        yExpected - expected y location
